website_summaries.verdict: For Monopoly lovers who are also in the Christmas spirit, you won't find a better choice – traditional rules and holiday-themed game pieces.
pros: A unique twist on Monopoly with a Christmas theme
Tokens include a candy cane, teddy bear, and lump of coal
cons: Rare reports of consumers receiving generic tokens, but customer support is helpful

customer_reviews.title: Received item that was not pictured
customer_reviews.text: I did not get game pieces shown in photo. Received cheap plastic cone-like game pieces. The main selling point for me were the game pieces. Would not recommend, nor reorder.
customer_reviews.author: shawnielea

customer_reviews.title: All the pieces were correct!
customer_reviews.text: Just had to write a review as I hesitated in buying this for the grandkids after reading several reviews that stated the board pieces were like "sorry" and not the fun "christmas objects" shown on the box. Much to my relief, the game pieces matched the pictured ones on the outside of the box. Everything arrived just fine and the kids had a great time playing.
customer_reviews.author: love 2 readTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Overall a very fun game. There are raindeer instead of railroads
customer_reviews.text: Overall a very fun game. There are raindeer instead of railroads, fun Christmas pieces instead of the traditional ones, and each space is something christmassy. I gave it to my dad for an early birthday present and we had a blast playing it. I gave it a 4 because it could of been more. The houses, I mean trees, were cheaply made and so were the the rest of the pieces. It was still fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such fun for the holidays!
customer_reviews.text: We love playing this version during the holidays. Some examples of the differences over a traditional Monopoly game: the Bah Humbug & Holiday Cheer cards have fun twists over the traditional Chance & Community Chest cards; the traditional railroad property cards are each reindeer property cards instead; you put presents, instead of houses, & Christmas trees, instead of hotels, on your properties. Super fun!
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: All pieces were not included!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed to open this game and find that all the pieces where not there!! Player pieces include: candy cane, train, teddy bear, reindeer, scrooge and a unique "lump of black coal” were not included!!! BUT, after the vendor reached out to me they gave me credit and followed through with the manufacturer and were able to get me the replacement pieces!! I am very appreciative of their custom service!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily G. Moscoso

customer_reviews.title: False advertising!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this game because I love Christmas and thought it would be nice to have this version. I loved how the pictures depicted the game, with the Christmas themed pieces especially. What I received was not what was advertised in the photos or in the attached description. I received cheap plastic pegs as the player pieces not the promised cute metal Christmas themed ones. I am very dissatisfied with what I received, the metal pieces help make the game great.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: ITEM WAS NOT AS DESCRIBED.
customer_reviews.text: The description says "Player pieces include: candy cane, train, teddy bear, reindeer, scrooge and a unique "lump of black coal". This is NOT what I received. The version you sent me has cheap wooden tokens, not the charming ones listed in the description. I am returning this. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Neradt

customer_reviews.title: Missing cards
customer_reviews.text: Sadly missing cards rite out of the box. For the price you would think that everything would be intact. The money is a bit generic looking but the rest of the game is all good. Solid game pieces and the included cards are decent quality. The kids still want to play and hopefully I can order the cards separate. Otherwise I'll order a replacement and return this.
customer_reviews.author: Barnaut

customer_reviews.title: Got the correct pieces!
customer_reviews.text: I was weary ordering this due to the previous reviews about the playing pieces, but I love Christmas and figured it would be fun to play anyways. I was pleasantly surprised to see that I was sent the correct metal playing pieces! I don't know if they've fixed the issue or some of us are getting lucky, but I did get the ones pictured on the box. Fun game too! Will be great for the holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R

customer_reviews.title: Christmasopoly wow
customer_reviews.text: I found this game at a goodwill for two bucks. Took it home and played it with my granddaughters and they loved the game so much they all wanted one for Christmas. I had never even known about the game when it came out. Christmas is my favorite time of year and now I can play Christmas all year round. So I went out and brought my granddaughters this game and found it for a great price on Amazon.com. , it came in and I can't wait to see their eyes at Christmas..
customer_reviews.author: kissme

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and contained the "metal" playing pieces illustrated on game board in Amazon photo. It's nicely themed. Instead of buying a set of houses, a player would purchase a set of Christmas plants or bakery Christmas items, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: The pieces were not cute little Christmas miniatures, they are sorry pegs. But amazon was amazing at helping us sort it out!
customer_reviews.author: Anderson family

customer_reviews.title: Do not order, item received not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The item received not as advertised, the game came with cheap playing pieces. Not included Player pieces: candy cane, train, teddy bear, reindeer, scrooge and a unique "lump of black coal" instead received plastic game pieces. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: stepnan15

customer_reviews.title: Board game was as advertised and fun to play.
customer_reviews.text: All symbols and characters were the metal ones not the plastic. Very fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun version, but wrong playing pieces!
customer_reviews.text: We found this game very entertaining, but we were disappointed in the player pieces. We would have enjoyed it much more if the correct playing pieces were included. Where are the cute Christmas pieces shown in the picture?
customer_reviews.author: mysterywriter6

customer_reviews.title: Was fun to play
customer_reviews.text: Was fun to play; however, the tokens were not the same as the ones represented in the description or picture. You get bland colored pawns instead of the Christmas playing pieces that are shown.. I would have sent this back if I had not opened the box before realizing that this product is misrepresented.
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play
customer_reviews.text: I have the regular monopoly game and with the different "Christmas themes" it makes the game that much more fun!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Getz

customer_reviews.title: Pieces are not what are listed.
customer_reviews.text: The pieces we received are just colored game pieces. Returning because this takes out some of the novelty and is not as worth the price. Also ordered as gift but the box was damaged so we kept it. We didn’t even know the pieces were different until we opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura G.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come with pieces stated on the product details. I was very disappointed because I was looking forward to playing the game with my kids for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Game pieces are not as shown!
customer_reviews.text: One of the main features of this game, were the movers which were all Christmas characters on the website. Unfortunately when I opened the game the pieces were hollow pieces of plastic in different colors (almost like Sorry pieces) instead of Scrooge, candy cane, etc. It was VERY disappointing to say the least. Needless to say, I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: TAS

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Game Pawns/Pieces
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed to find cheap colored games tokens/pawns instead of what they advertised (candy cane, teddy bear, etc.). Contacted (800) 422-3434 - game manufacturer. They were extremely understanding and are mailing me the actual metal tokens. False advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Item Description.
customer_reviews.text: In the picture when i was looking at it, It had a picture at the bottom of the pieces and it displayed metel game pieces which was A candy cane, A train, A teddy bear, And A Nutcracker it looks like somebody took game pieces from a different game I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: It’s fun
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice. Board is thin. Guess that’s how they make things these day. Fun game. I recommend for holiday fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Game came not as pictured. Has generic peg like tokens. What a disappointment. Going back.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Woman

customer_reviews.title: Fun little twist to the classic monopoly board game
customer_reviews.text: Fun little twist to the classic monopoly board game. The properties are all Christmas themed of course and the backs of the cards is usually a little tidbit of information based on the subject. The addition of presents as houses and Christmas trees as hotels is a nice touch as well. Only reason I'm docking a star here is cause the box that was shipped to me came missing the dice (which is an important part of the game...luckily I always have spares laying around).
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Simon

customer_reviews.title: Monopoly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, and they loved it. They like to collect monopoly games.
customer_reviews.author: missturtle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to play.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this Christmas version of Monopoly. Going to make this a family tradition.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa - Boymom

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find this game, and couldn't wait to give it as a gift. A week later I found it MUCH cheaper at the local TJ Maxx.
customer_reviews.author: Acassie

customer_reviews.title: Did not get the game pictured
customer_reviews.text: Like others have stated, I did not receive what was pictured, but cheap plastic tokens instead of the metal ones. Returning for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong pieces!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for the pieces and I got cheap plastic pieces! This is not ok!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: sami kowalzek

customer_reviews.title: Very holiday!
customer_reviews.text: Played last weekend with my grandsons and they loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a family holiday game night.
customer_reviews.text: Travel around the classic board and put yourself in the holiday spirit. Fun game for everyone. Make this part of your family’s holiday tradition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come with the Christmas pieces that I was hopping for. The one in the pic so.... I'm so disappointed 😞.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Not proper game parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing proper playing parts as shown on box cover online..got plain plastic player parts instead..my wife is upset..not good.
customer_reviews.author: moparman

customer_reviews.title: Finally got one! Play 50 times every Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it... whom I kidding I can’t get enough of this game! Better than actual monopoly!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved the game. The whole family enjoyed playing it throughout the holiday season
customer_reviews.author: cathy rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great family tradition for the holiday!
customer_reviews.text: My son received this as an early Christmas present from his Elf on the Shelf and it is really fun to play! :) I can see us getting it out each year to play for the holidays...great family tradition to start!
customer_reviews.author: Jane D.

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t played it yet, but excited for Christmas to have every play and have fun.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Walker

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this game and we even play it during the year but really fun at Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Fun Christmas game!
customer_reviews.text: We had a lot of fun playing this game with our grandchildren over Christmas. Easy to play with their ages of 10 to 17. Adults played too!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Watkins

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: The tokens are ugly, cheap plastic and not the fun Christmas tokens pictured and described. I consider it false advertising
customer_reviews.author: ALB

customer_reviews.title: Christmas game
customer_reviews.text: No problems with this game came as expected with metal playing pieces very cute for Christmas my wife loved it !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO much fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: This game is so much fun!We plan to make playing a yearly tradition during the holidays. My kids love all of the holiday themed playing pieces, properties, etc. It was definitely worth the price and the quicker shipping I paid to get it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: After playing the traditional game for 40 years it's taking some time to get used to all the changes
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Love Christmas-opoly!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun game! I saw two different Christmas Monopoly type games - I purchased two of these...one for my daughter and one for my niece! They both love it, and I have to say - I do too!
customer_reviews.author: My2lovies

customer_reviews.title: So fun and novel
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my 14-year old daughter. She loves it - the whole family loves it! So fun and novel! Makes a unique gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kaycee Vise

customer_reviews.title: Holiday Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Family fun with a Christmas twist! Our whole family likes this game and gets a kick out of the Christmas theme.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun for the whole family!! I never review products but if you love Christmas and spending time with family, this game is amazing!

customer_reviews.title: This ended up being a disappointment. Squares are things like "3 Gingerbread cookies"
customer_reviews.text: This ended up being a disappointment. Squares are things like "3 Gingerbread cookies". Perfectf for the Salvation Army or a church toy drive and that's where It's going.

customer_reviews.title: Great board game
customer_reviews.text: Great toy! Just wish it would have had a Santa 🎅🏽 or Christmas 🎄 tree or Christmas stocking Or even a snowman ⛄️ for game pieces.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful version of Monopoly
customer_reviews.text: My family loves board games. We are always looking for something new for holiday gatherings. I was very pleased with this beautiful version of Monopoly. It arrived in less than a week. I am sure this will be a holiday surprise for the entire family.

customer_reviews.title: Prepbooks Top Notch!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game for the Christmas build up. The theme is great and the board is really nice!! Prepbooks is top notch as there was a minor problem with the game but they took care of it immediately. I would reccomend this to anyone that has children 8 and up they will love this game!!

customer_reviews.text: Realy enjoyed the holiday version! I think this was a good buy for my family. I'd recommend this for family fun.

customer_reviews.title: This seller is misleading the consumer. And, scammed for my credit card PIN number.
customer_reviews.text: Advertised with metal playing pieces, but only plastic playing pieces were included. False and misleading. Certainly not worth $37, when sold at Walgreen’s for $20!

customer_reviews.title: Christmas-opoly
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful game to play during the holidays...the whole family can have a great time on game night. I played it with my Mother and her candycane took my Mr. Scrooge for everything he had...:) A fun game to bring out at the end of the year to help add to the ambience of the Holiday Season.

customer_reviews.title: Fun!

It makes a great centerpiece for our table and the patron who won it last year said it was a blast to play...if you like monopoly of course.

customer_reviews.title: Seems fun!
customer_reviews.text: it has the same rules as the original monopoly, but with changes in the names of properties & things. I haven't played it yet, but it looks like it will be a lot of fun! I only wish the photos were all consistent. Some of it looks like cheap clip art slapped onto a card or section of the board. But that's my only complaint! **EDIT:// We played this with my cousins this past Christmas & we laughed the entire time! We loved it! Look out for the mistletoe!

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Christmas family game nights!
customer_reviews.text: My kids, 9 and 11, are on a Monopoly kick, so I ordered this for them in December. It's a fun Christmas twist on the original version. There's not a whole lot that's actually different as far as the rules, but it's a nice festive addition to our game collection. Our coffee table is open underneath, so it's nice that the box looks decorative and festive as well. I put it away with our Christmas decorations, and I can't wait to get it out again next Christmas season.
customer_reviews.author: KMLA

customer_reviews.title: Gift for grand kids

customer_reviews.title: A Christmas Fun Game!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game for Christmas! It's played just like the regular Monopoly game, but with a Christmas twist. It's beautifully made and well worth the low price that I paid for it. If you love Monopoly and love Christmas, adults and children will LOVE this game!
customer_reviews.author: E. Lotcpeich

product_meta.title: Christmas-opoly
product_meta.description:
It's beginning to look a lot like Christmas. Get your lights up, your presents wrapped, gather family and friends and pop the lid off the Late For The Sky Christmas-opoly Board Game. Watch out players! You may be run over by a reindeer. Be nice or you may end up with a lump of coal. To play this Late For The Sky Board Games creation, collect Christmas properties, increase your property value by buying presents and trading them in for a Christmas tree. It's all fun and games until someone blows a fuse, gets snowed in or gets sent to naughty and is out of the game for three turns. Whatever happens, you better not pout! This Late For The Sky Board Games twist on one of the world's most iconic board games brings all the fun and festive cheer of the season to your table for yourself, friends and family.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
It's beginning to look a lot like Christmas. Get your lights up, your presents wrapped, gather family and friends, and pop the lid off Christmas-opoly. Watch out players. You may be run over by a reindeer. Be nice or you may end up with a lump of coal. To play, collect Christmas properties, increase your property value by buying presents and trading them in for a Christmas tree. It's all fun and games until someone blows a fuse, gets snowed in, or gets sent to naughty and is out of the game for three turns. Whatever happens, you better not pout.
feature_bullets: Player pieces include: candy cane, train, teddy bear, reindeer, scrooge and a unique "lump of black coal"
Includes directions for traditional play and 1 hour play
Festive twist on one of the most well known board games
Christmas-opoly is a game to celebrate the season
Includes directions for traditional play and for the one hour version as well
